description: NOTICE: REQUEST FOR PROPOSALRFP #25-14 The City of Galveston is accepting sealed proposals on a contract for City Hall 3rd Floor Renovation. Sealed proposals shall be uploaded to the Purchasing Division online portal for solicitation submittals. There will be a non-mandatory pre-proposal conference on Thursday, July 31, 2025, at 10:00 a.m., at the following location: City of Galveston City Hall 823 Rosenberg Street Room 100 Galveston Texas 77550 Solicitation submittals will be received until 10:00 a.m., Tuesday September 9, 2025 and opened immediately in that office. Any response received after that time will not be considered. Click the link below to upload your submittal. UPLOAD YOUR SUBMITTAL HERE The Public Opening will be held via the Zoom Meeting platform. See below for meeting information: Microsoft Teams Need help? Join the meeting now Meeting ID: 248 029 634 234 2 Passcode: at6vQ96B Dial in by phone +1 469-250-9198,,458885117# United States, Dallas Find a local number Phone conference ID: 458 885 117# For organizers: Meeting options | Reset dial-in PIN ________________________________________________________________________________ The City of Galveston encourages all Disadvantaged Business Enterprise (DBE) vendors to participate in all invitations to bid; including all HUB, women and minority owned businesses. City of GalvestonDepartment of FinancePurchasing Division
